column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Yue says : " Do n't worry , Prince Zuko ca n't be getting too far in this weather . "
#Text=Katara says : " I 'm not worried they 'll get away in the blizzard .
#Text=If we know anything , it 's that Zuko never gives up .
#Text=They 'll survive , and we 'll find them .
#Text=" Koh says : " It 's been a long time since I 've added a child 's face to my collection .
#Text=So ... how may I help you ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I need to find the moon and the ocean .
#Text=" Koh says : " Their spirit names are Tui and La , push and pull .
#Text=And that has been the nature of their relationship for all time .
#Text=" Aang says : " Please .
#Text=Help me find them .
#Text=An entire culture could be destroyed if I do n't get their help .
#Text=" Koh says : " Oh , you think you need their help .
#Text=Actually it 's quite the other way round .
#Text=Someone 's going to kill them !
#Text=" Aang says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=How can I find them and protect them ?
#Text=" Koh says : " You 've already met them , actually .
#Text=Tui and La , your moon and ocean , have always circled each other in an eternal dance .
#Text=They balance each other , push and pull , life and death , good and evil , yin and yang .
#Text=" Aang says : " The koi fish !
#Text=I must be going now .
#Text=" Koh says : " We 'll meet again .
#Text=" Aang says : " The spirits are in trouble , I need to get back to the physical world .
#Text=" Roku says : " A friend is here , to guide you back .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hei Bai !
#Text=" Zhao says : " We 'll be following this map to a very special location .
#Text=And when we get there , we 're going fishing .
#Text="
